project.name: Calvary Fellowship Baptist Church Website
project.description: Website for Calvary Fellowship Baptist Church in Painesville, OH built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Airtable

phases.phase1: Foundation - GitHub repo, domain, email, Next.js setup
phases.phase2: Core Pages - Homepage, About, Visit Us, Contact, layout components
phases.phase3: Airtable Integration - Set up base, API routes, dynamic data
phases.phase4: Dynamic Pages - Ministry pages, leader profiles, blog posts
phases.phase5: Forms & Submissions - Contact form, validation, Airtable integration
phases.phase6: Giving Integration - Stripe setup and donation page
phases.phase7: Design & Responsiveness - TailwindCSS styling, mobile optimization
phases.phase8: Deployment - Vercel setup, domain configuration, DNS setup
phases.phase9: Optimization & Launch - Final QA, analytics, submission
